global.title: Help / inform about error
global.captcha_help: Enter the verification code that you can see in the picture. Letter case does not matter.

messages.request_send_success: Your request has been successfully sent.
messages.please_fill_all_fields: Please, fill in all the necessary fields.
messages.wrong_captcha: Wrong verification code! Please, try again.
messages.look_like_bot: Please, click here to confirm that you're not a bot.

beforeask.shownName: Before asking a question report about a mistake
beforeask.defaultValue:
1. please, make sure that your question is not available in FAQ.
  2. please, make sure that you are using the latest version of browser (Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Opera, Internet Explorer).
  3. please, fill in all the details in the form below.

details.shownName: Detailed description of the question / mistake

link.helpText: If an error occurs on a certain page report it here, please.

technical.helpText: Which browser do you use (Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox, Opera)? If possible, please, specify your browser version.
